name: Smoked Sausage with Potatoes, Sauerkraut & Ale
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: This German-inspired one-skillet dinner combines smoked sausage slices, potatoes, sauerkraut, ale and whole grain mustard for a quick and hearty meal.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage, diagonally cut into 1/4-inch slices
directions: Cook sausage in a large skillet over medium high heat for 3 minutes, turning occasionally
Add oil and potatoes to skillet and cook until golden brown
Add ale, sauerkraut and mustard to skillet, mixing with potatoes until blended
Cook over medium-high heat for 2 minutes
Return the sausage to the skillet, continue cooking for 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender
